name: POOL [of doom!]
description:
POOL is an arcade first-person arena shooter inspired by Doom, Quake, and a particular cue sport. Either you knock the balls into the pockets, or balls knock you into a pocket.

It was made for One Script Games jam.

Source code: https://bitbucket.org/yal_cc/pool-of-doom/

Controls:

  • WASD, Space: Movement
  • Left mouse button (hold): Charge and attack
  • F5/F6/F7/F8: Change antialiasing (if supported)
  • Alt+Enter: Fullscreen (recommended)

Currently no OSX build due to discovering several bugs (1, 2).
